sentences.en: In those years the landless peasants were brought to beggary.
sentences.cn: 在那些年月里无地的农民一贫如洗.

sentences.en: The Chinese in Singapore were the descendants of illiterate landless, peasants from Guangdong and Fujian.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的中国人都是来自广东和福建的目不识丁无田无地约贫苦农民的后裔.

sentences.en: The landless vegetation slope protection of tailing dams is a new technology in our country.
sentences.cn: 尾矿库坝坡无土植被护坡在国内是一项新兴的技术.

sentences.en: The problems of landless farmers have been all along the hot topic in various academic fields.
sentences.cn: 失地农民问题一直是各个学科领域的研究热点.

sentences.en: They are mostly jobless and landless, and they are often informally barred from villages.
sentences.cn: 大多数人既无土地也没工作, 通常被非正式的禁止进入村镇.

sentences.en: Those most in need will be the landless, both rural and urban, and marginal subsistence farmers.
sentences.cn: 最需要帮助的人群, 是城乡的无地者和处于温饱边缘的农民.

sentences.en: We are giving an equal area of land to the landless.
sentences.cn: 我们向无耕地者分发同等面积的土地。

words.tran_cn: 着陆器；出铁槽；把钩工人
着陆；[水运] 初见陆地；到达陆地
登陆，登岸（land的过去时和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 无主地的，无不动产的，无陆地的
